result.title: My Blog -- codes and tutorials
result.content:
Hello,there. I'm a senior high school student from Taiwan. I recently began to write some tutorial of problems from online Judges. You can view them if you are interested:

Coding Beans

There are some articles which has no tutorial but only the code and some possible bug on implement. It really depends on how much I think I should explain on the idea which is hard to figure out.

Though now they are all written in Chinese,I may write some tutorials in English in the future.

Basically,I write 2 ~ 3 tutorials every day. When I get stuck on some problems,there might be nothing updated for a couple of days.

By the way,Here's my friend's(fsps60312) blog:

code scenic

We have been doing the same problem set recently , so you may find a lot of problems that we both have posted tutorials. If a tutorial is needed, I think either one will do.

If you have any question or suggestion, or find any mistake I made, please comment to let me know.

Thank you for reading this article ,have a nice coding day.

UPD: any discussion on any problem is welcomed. You can also comment on fsps60312's blog.We will discuss them together after reading the problems.
